author: Xbox
description:
This will be a collection to remember! Capcom Fighting Collection 2 is now available on Xbox One!

Experience a powerful pack of iconic fighting games throughout Capcom's history, including:

Capcom vs. SNK: Millennium Fight 2000 Pro
Capcom vs. SNK 2: Mark of the Millennium 2001
Capcom Fighting Evolution
Street Fighter Alpha 3 UPPER
Project Justice
Power Stone
Power Stone 2
Plasma Sword: Nightmare of Bilstein

Featuring online play with rollback netcode, an extensive art gallery, music to groove to, and tons of quality of life updates, jump into these 8 classic titles and join the fight today!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/capcom-fighting-collection-2/9n61wc19b7kf

©CAPCOM ©SNK CORPORATION ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.

title: Great New Games 2025

author: Xbox
description:
Get ready to return to the nightmare…

The first free DLC for Ravenswatch, ""Romeo & Juliet"", arrives on May 27!

Rendez-vous on May 27 to play the duo inspired by the tragic tale and dive deeper into the darkness with exciting gameplay updates. Sharpen your blades, load your gun, and prepare to rewrite this story the Ravenswatch way.

🔥Two new playable heros - Romeo & Juliet
⚔️ Choose between both characters for strategic gameplay, you can play them alone, or together to maximise their potentiel!

Available as a free update on Xbox One and Xbox Series X|S on May 27.
